local_intent: Lift the grasped lid vertically along +Z (~0.12 m) to clear the pot; binned dist=0.1.
assumptions: Lid is already grasped from prior steps

coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer step matching GLOBAL_BT MoveDelta (z, timeout 1200) with pre-check and post-verify for stability.
